summary: A group of collegians are forced to take shelter in a mysterious Krishna Cottage for the night. Little do they know that the cottage is haunted by a spirit.
cast: Sohail Khan|Isha Koppikar|Anita Hassanandani Reddy|Rati Agnihotri|Hiten Tejwani|Divya Palat|Vrajesh Hirjee|Raj Zutshi|Shaukat Baig|Bobby Bedii|Shama Deshpande|Rajendra Gupta|Dinesh Kaushik|Usha Nadkarni
title: Krishna Cottage
